sense.gloss: aim, what one wants, the mark
key point (of a conversation, etc.), essence
acupuncture point, moxibustion point, pressure point
position on the fingerboard (of a shamisen, koto, etc.)
hu (ancient Chinese vessel shaped like a vase, usually used to store alcohol)
plunge basin, waterfall lake, plunge pool, basin under a waterfall
ink line, tool for marking long, straight lines on flat surfaces
funerary urn, cinerary urn, burial urn, cremation urn

sdata.j: ↑向↑↓む↓こうの↑思↑↓おも↓う↑壷↑↓つぼ↓だぞ。
sdata.e: You will play into their hands.

sdata.j: ↑砂糖↑↓さとう↓は↑壷↑↓つぼ↓にほとんど↑残↑↓のこ↓っていません。
sdata.e: There is little sugar left in the pot.

sdata.j: ↑数↑↓すう↓↑枚↑↓まい↓の↑古↑↓ふる↓い↑硬貨↑↓こうか↓の↑入↑↓はい↓った↑壷↑↓つぼ↓を↑見↑↓み↓つけた。
sdata.e: I found a pot in which there were several old coins.

sdata.j: ↑壷↑↓つぼ↓には↑砂糖↑↓さとう↓が↑残↑↓のこ↓っていない。
sdata.e: There is no sugar left in the pot.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は、↑粘土↑↓ねんど↓で↑優雅↑↓ゆうが↓な↑壷↑↓つぼ↓を↑形作↑↓かたちづく↓った。
sdata.e: He fashioned an elegant pot out of clay.

sdata.j: ↑祖母↑↓そぼ↓の↑遺↑↓のこ↓↑灰↑↓はい↓は↑寺院↑↓じいん↓に↑置↑↓お↓かれた↑骨壷↑↓こつつぼ↓に↑入↑↓はい↓っている。
sdata.e: Grandmother's ashes are in an urn at the temple.

words.gloss: hu (ancient Chinese vessel shaped like a vase, usually used to store alcohol)
plunge basin, waterfall lake, plunge pool, basin under a waterfall
